modName: She Hulk and Red She Hulk Follower
summary: Add new stand alone female follower base of She Hulk a one handed warrior level up with player from level 10
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][b]She Hulk and Red She Hulk[/b][/u]

Add Two new stand alone female follower base of She Hulk and Red She Hulk a one handed warrior level up with player from level 10

Name : She Hulk & Red She Hulk
Body : -CBBE-
Class : One handed Warrior
Level : 10
Extra : carry capacity 1000 weight

[u][b]Location : [/b][/u]
[b]She Hulk[/b]
The Silver Blood Inn in Markhearth

[b]Red She Hulk[/b]
The Bee and barb inn in Riften
[b]
Required :[/b]
Skyrim.esm

[b]Recommended : [/b]
The LOOT
http://loot.github.io/

UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by [b]Original - fLokii -- Recent updates - Vamyan[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037

Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO by [b]terzaerian[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019

[b]Small Note :[/b]
Im not going to take any request of changing the appearance. [u]Only[/u] to the error for the file.
for the load order i highly recommended The LOOT on Recomended list
if it still not working or cause your game to crash i suggested to remove the file.
[b]
[/b][b]Issue: [/b]
There are small clipping on the She Hulk armor but it should not be a problem.[b]

Installation : [/b]

NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]

Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

[b]Credit : [/b]

BETHESDA

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666

BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by [b]Caliente[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015

Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986

Battle Hardened Body Mod Vanilla UNP UNPB UNPC CBBE ADEC by [b]Wast1980[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32329

KS Hairdos - 400 by [b]Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221

[b]Please leave a comment and endorsement
"Thank you for download"[/b][/center]
author: Fachry
